name: smart-investment-portal
description: Smart Investment Portal - A comprehensive real estate investment platform

scripts.build: pnpm --filter config build && pnpm --filter db build && pnpm --filter ui build && pnpm --filter web build
scripts.db:migrate: pnpm --filter db exec prisma migrate dev
scripts.db:migrate:deploy: pnpm --filter db exec prisma migrate deploy
scripts.db:seed: pnpm --filter db exec prisma db seed
scripts.db:reset: pnpm --filter db exec prisma migrate reset
scripts.db:push: pnpm --filter db exec prisma db push
scripts.setup: pnpm install && pnpm db:generate && pnpm db:push
scripts.build:packages: pnpm --filter config build && pnpm --filter db build && pnpm --filter ui build
